Computer Graphics Programming Assignment

Question one

Using the PNGWriter class, write a program to create a PNG image (called image.png) with dimensions 300 pixels by 300 pixels and containing a red primary diagonal line (top left to bottom right) and a green secondary diagonal line (bottom left to top right), then fill the lowest bounded quadrant in blue. 10 Marks

class PNGWriter

PNGWriter class for creating and manipulating PNG images using PIL (Pillow).

Variables:

  • width (int) – Width of the image.

  • height (int) – Height of the image.

__init__(width, height)

Initialize the PNGWriter with the specified width and height.

Parameters:

  • width (int) – Width of the image.

  • height (int) – Height of the image.

save(filename)

Save the generated image to a file.

Parameters:

filename (str) – The name of the file to save the image to.

draw_primary_diagonal(color)

Draw the primary diagonal of the image with the specified color.

Parameters:

color (str) – Color of the diagonal line.

draw_secondary_diagonal(color)

Draw the secondary diagonal of the image with the specified color.

Parameters:

color (str) – Color of the diagonal line.

fill_quadrant(color, quadrant)

Fill a specified quadrant of the image with the specified color.

Parameters:

  • color (str) – Color to fill the quadrant with.

  • quadrant (int) – Quadrant to fill (0: top-left, 1: top-right, 2: bottom-left, 3: bottom-right).
